author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Corporate Bitcoin Holdings Nears $85B, More Than Doubling in a Year
description: The number of public companies holding bitcoin in their treasuries has increased to 116 after surging with the election of Donald Trump.
content:
Bitcoin 
 has taken deeper root in corporate treasuries, with 116 public companies now holding a combined 809,100 BTC, worth around $85 billion based on current prices, at the end of May.Thats a dra… [+1696 chars]
